content: Hello everyone! Just getting started in Rust and I wanted to use it for the Advent of Code challenge. Are there any groups to join that can look over my submissions and see if they are idomatic Rust?
Not sure about other places, but there's an AoC subreddit and sometimes solutions get posted to /r/rust. There's also /r/learnrust for questions about idiomatic code.
I think people in community Rust discord had a dedicated channel for AoC
